title: Project-Based Learning (PBL) Design Utilizing Digital Media for Secondary Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Secondary Science Theories, Experience with Digital Tools, and Basics of Project-Based Learning
context.additional_context: A science education competency enhancement program at vocational training institutions, focusing on cultivating PBL (Project-Based Learning) design and execution skills using digital media

learning_goals: Can perform PBL project design stages in secondary science education contexts with over 80% accuracy
Can propose three or more strategies for utilizing digital media (AR/VR/interactive content) for science concept delivery
Can design and apply rubrics for PBL assessment in mobile-based microlearning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
